game.name: Inside Darkness
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Inside Darkness is a 2D puzzle-platformer where a young girl must harness the power of light and shadow to transform between human and creature, solve puzzles, and escape a kingdom filled with danger. Explore ancient catacombs, unlock secrets, and master your dual nature in this fantasy adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Inside Darkness is a 2D puzzle-platformer where a young girl must harness the power of light and shadow to transform between human and creature, solve puzzles, and escape a kingdom filled with danger. Explore ancient catacombs, unlock secrets, and master your dual nature in this fantasy adventure.
